comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Turning the first sod ceremony described in newspaper report here: nla.gov.au/nla.news-article16090697 In this photograph we see two men (perhaps one is a boy) in the back of the lorry holding clumps of dirt aloft. Other photographs of the turning of the first sod show a much more crowded scene, and with the steam excavator immediately adjacent to the tractor drawn lorry. For example: nla.gov.au/nla.pic-an11030057-53 trove.nla.gov.au/work/36155914 nla.gov.au/nla.pic-an23675568
